mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE_SEARCH_TH /** insertSearchHistory | 장소검색 이력 단건 등록 */ ( TRANS_AT /* 거래일시 */ , QUERY /* 질의어 */ , FRST_RGS_AT /* 최초등록일시 */ ) VALUES ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) , #{query} , NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT /** selectPopularKeywords | 인기 키워드 목록 조회 */ QUERY /* 질의어 */ , COUNT(QUERY) AS QUERY_CNT /* 조회횟수 */ FROM PLACE_SEARCH_TH WHERE 1=1
AND TRANS_AT <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) AND TRANS_AT >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATEADD(HOUR,-24,NOW()))
GROUP BY QUERY ORDER BY QUERY_CNT DESC, query ASC LIMIT 10
